channel.title: Item On Object?!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
Im making a halloween event but I dont know how to make a code so where you use item on object.
Object = 7316 Item = 605
I want it to so they need 28 of they item and then the items delete when they use on the object and they get reward = 1053, 1055, or 1055.
I Dont want it to them to get all the rewards at one time. thanks.
